data.actual_result: Options doesn't appear on screen and you even can't scroll up so see them...
data.expected_result: "Done & Set to Default" these options should appear
data.short_description: In Landscape mode you can't see "DONE" and "Reset To Default" in role color picker
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to Landscape mode - Get in any server where you can manage roles - Create new role & open color picker
